logs.step1_raw_spec:
```
FUNCTION separate_vowels_and_consonants(input_string) RETURNS concatenated_string
BEGIN
    DEFINE vowels AS "aeiouAEIOU"
    DECLARE vowel_chars AS empty list
    DECLARE consonant_chars AS empty list

    FOR each character IN input_string DO
        IF character IS IN vowels THEN
            ADD character TO vowel_chars
        ELSE
            ADD character TO consonant_chars
        END IF
    END FOR

    SET concatenated_string TO concatenate vowel_chars AND consonant_chars

    RETURN concatenated_string
END FUNCTION
```

logs.step2_generated_code_raw:
FUNCTION separate_vowels_and_consonants(input_string) RETURNS concatenated_string
BEGIN
    vowels = "aeiouAEIOU"
    vowel_chars = []
    consonant_chars = []

    for char in input_string:
        if char in vowels:
            vowel_chars.append(char)
        else:
            consonant_chars.append(char)

    concatenated_string = ''.join(vowel_chars) + ''.join(consonant_chars)

    return concatenated_string
END FUNCTION
